org.echo.mobile.bitcoinj

Class LazyECPoint

  • org.echo.mobile.bitcoinj.LazyECPoint

  • public class LazyECPoint

    A wrapper around ECPoint that delays decoding of the point for as long as possible. This is useful because point encode/decode in Bouncy Castle is quite slow especially on Dalvik, as it often involves decompression/recompression.

      • normalize

        public org.spongycastle.math.ec.ECPoint normalize()

        Normalization ensures that any projective coordinate is 1, and therefore that the x, y coordinates reflect those of the equivalent point in an affine coordinate system.

        Returns:
        a new ECPoint instance representing the same point, but with normalized coordinates
